Title: PAPLE: Decentralized Organic Food Supply Chain
Body: PAPLE:  Decentralized Organic Food Supply Chain

Author: Debra M
Title: PAPLE: Decentralized Organic Food Supply Chain
Body: PAPLE Brings the Value of Blockchain to Organic Food Supply Chains   The deliberate substitution, tampering, or misrepresentation of food has increased significantly because of the complex global food supply chain system.  A supply chain is the process involved from the inception of producing organic foods and dairy products to delivering it to the end customer.  PAPLE plans to integrate Blockchain technology into the supply chain process to track information about your food.  The value of Blockchain here is its ability to make the supply chain entirely transparent from farm to table.   Blockchain technology can be used to improve traceability by providing trusted information on the origin and state of products. In the case of the global food supply chain, growers, suppliers, processors, distributors, retailers, regulators and consumers can gain access to information regarding the origin and state of food for their transactions.  This can enable food providers and other members of the ecosystem to use a Blockchain network to trace a product to its source.  PAPLE will use this technology to enable farmers, manufacturers and retailers to justify premiums for certain products.  It will also give consumers confidence about where their food comes from and how it was produced.   For the customer, being able to see where the produce comes from and how the raw components were sourced is an opportunity to enhance the quality of consumed and used products, which, in the long run, can potentially lead to a significant positive effect on healthcare needs.  For more information on the PAPLE project visit their website at https://paple.net.  You can also join PAPLE’s Telegram page at https://t.me/PAPLE_NET, where team members are available to answer your questions.  PAPLE’s ICO Close Group Token Sale begins July 15, 2018.   Debra McCann debra@dmccann.com

Author: Debra M
Title: PAPLE: Decentralized Organic Food Supply Chain
Body: PAPLE:  Blockchain Platform for Organic Way of Life  Connectivity in the agriculture market is the goal of our Preservation of Animals and Protection of Lives on Earth (“PAPLE”) Ecosystem. Offering a marketplace system that provides users with unimaginable connectivity and modernization from all facets of the organic agriculture market is the main tenant of PAPLE. Our platform is backed by Blockchain technology that benefits everyone involved with the PAPLE ecosystem.  The PAPLE platform gives the agriculture market, organic food market, and dairy market community a way to interact with the PAPLE ecosystem for furthering its goal of protecting animals and lives on earth. This is an initiative against food adulteration. We strive to provide healthy food for a healthy society.
